# llms.txt

Short, link-first navigation map for LLMs and agents. Keep this file minimal.

## Placement
- Next.js: place at `/public/llms.txt` to serve as `/llms.txt`
- Non-web repos: place at `/llms.txt` in the repo root

## Primary links
- README: `/README.md`
- ENS: `/ens.md` (if present)

## Optional links (if present)
- Architecture: `/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md`
- API: `/docs/API.md`
- Runbook: `/docs/RUNBOOK.md`
- Security baseline: `/policies/security-baseline.md`
- No-hardcode policy: `/policies/no-hardcode.md`
- Agents: `/agents/`
- Skills index: `/skills/INDEX.md`
- Playbooks: `/playbooks/`
